What is the outlook for Pinched Nerve ?,"With treatment, most people recover from pinched nerve. However, in some cases, the damage is irreversible.",NINDS,Pinched Nerve
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Pinched Nerve ?,"Within the NINDS research programs, pinched nerves are addressed primarily through studies associated with pain research.
